author: Sam
title: Ciara on â€˜The Color Purpleâ€™: â€œOne of My Proudest Accomplishments of My Careerâ€
text: With [â€˜The Color Purpleâ€™](https://thatgrapejuice.net/entertainment/2023/10/extended-trailer-the-color-purple-starring-fantasia-halle-bailey-ciara-danielle-brooks-taraji-p-henson-more/) off to a [blazing start at the US box office](https://thatgrapejuice.net/entertainment/2023/12/the-color-purple-triumphs-with-huge-christmas-day-opening/), Ciara has joined her castmates in celebrating the film everyone is talking about. As reported, the singer â€“ who [gave birth to her fourth child earlier this month](https://thatgrapejuice.net/2023/12/ciara-gives-birth-welcomes-new-baby-girl-with-russell-wilson/) â€“ plays adult Nettie in the Blitz Bazawule-directed film. Reimagined as a musical, the latest incarnation of Alice Walkerâ€˜s beloved tale also sees CiCi appear on its [star-studded soundtrack.](https://thatgrapejuice.net/2023/12/stream-the-color-purple-soundtrack-featuring-fantasia-usher-megan-thee-stallion-mary-j-blige-h-e-r-alicia-keys-more/) In a touching post, the [â€˜Level Upâ€™](https://thatgrapejuice.net/2018/07/new-song-ciara-level-full/) performer reflects on what the moment means to her and her trajectory at large. See what she had to say belowâ€¦ Sharing a clip of her dancing and posing it up with the likes of castmates Fantasia Barrino, Taraji P. Henson, and Danielle Brooks, as well as the filmâ€™s producer Oprah Winfrey, Ciara wrote: â€œOne of my proudest accomplishments of my career and this year! This was truly an honor to be a part of this beautiful ensemble. Thank you @BlitzAmbassador for believing in me. Me as Nettie! @TheColorPurple Out Now ðŸ’œâ€ One of my proudest accomplishments of my career and this year! This was truly an honor to be a part of this beautiful ensemble. Thank you [@BlitzAmbassador]for believing in me. Me as Nettie! [@TheColorPurple]Out Now ðŸ’œ [pic.twitter.com/xWDazHw2mc] â€” Ciara (@ciara) [December 28, 2023] Touching! â€˜The Color Purple,â€™ which has [nabbed multiple Golden Globes nominations](https://thatgrapejuice.net/entertainment/2023/12/golden-globes-2024-full-nominations-list-fantasia-danielle-brooks-colman-domingo-barbie-more-named/), is playing in US theaters now and dances into UK cinemas on January 26.

author: Ravinder Malik
title: Chilling Conditions worsen: Red alert across 22 Haryana districts - The Daily Guardian
text: Throughout Haryana, dense fog blanketed the region on Wednesday. Due to slow winds and humidity, the visibility remained low until afternoon without any significant improvement. Hisar, Karnal, Bhiwani, and Sirsa witnessed visibility ranging from 20 to 50 meters. Some areas in Hisar experienced a cold wave. The Meteorological Department issued a dense fog warning across all cities in Haryana today. The Weather Department declared a red alert in 22 districts of the state. A red alert is declared when weather conditions are expected to be extremely adverse. Additionally, an orange alert has been issued for December 29th and 30th. In several cities, the absence of sunlight led to a cold day. The temperature difference between day and night in many cities ranged from just four to six degrees. Cold day conditions were reported in some districts of the state, classified when the daytime temperature is below 15 degrees Celsius and six degrees below the normal temperature. Hisar, Jhajjar, and Rohtak recorded daytime temperatures notably six degrees below normal. This weather pattern caused significant disruptions in daily activities, prompting authorities to issue warnings and alerts across various regions in Haryana.
